title: Hiiro no Kakera: Mezame no Toki
original_name: 緋色の欠片 目覚めの刻
sinopse: Tamaki goes back to her old village and suddenly she is attacked by monsters. Her grandmother then tells her that she’s the "Tamayorihime", and her duty is to guard a powerful sword called Onikirimaru together with her 6 male guardians.
